main: Gains {status:DevyatDimensionalSack} over time passively at a rate of 3 per turn.
Gains additional {status:DevyatDimensionalSack} per use of her S1, S2, and defense skills.

{status:DevyatDimensionalSack} increases her Coin Power and damage for her skills as well as increasing their status application ({status:Agility} and {status:DefenseDown} for S2 and {status:Burst} Count for S3). She also gains +1 speed at 10+ stack and +1 {status:ParryingResultUp} and {status:SlashDamageUp} at 20+ stack. At 30+ stack, she starts receiving increasing HP and SP damage every turn until she dies. At 15+ stack, her defense skill causes her to retreat instead. This halves her stacks when she returns.

At 15 Potency and 3 Count of {status:Burst} on her target, her S1 and S2 stops applying {status:Burst} but also stops consuming Count. Her S3 also stops applying {status:Burst}, but instead gives her last coin a reuse.
other: Her passive gives her a shield based on her {status:DevyatDimensionalSack} stacks at 6+ speed or if she has {status:Agility} (gained on S2 2nd coin heads hit or on stagger or kill on the last coin of her S3). She also gives {status:ParryingResultUp} to 2 allies next turn when she retreats.

1091001.desc:
Turn Start: At 6+ Speed, or if this unit has [Agility], gain ([DevyatDimensionalSack]/2)% of this unit's max HP as Shield (max 15%)

Upon Retreat, apply 1 [ParryingResultUp] to 2 allies next turn (prioritizes Substituted units first, then in Deployment order)
1091001.name: Speedy Delivery

1091002.desc: <For Chain Battles> When, after Retreating with '[Retreat]', if this unit rejoins the battle, halve the [DevyatDimensionalSack] value (once per Encounter, rounded up)
1091002.name: Lemme go and I swear I'll make it in time!

1091011.desc:
Turn Start: At 6+ Speed, or if this unit has [Agility], gain ([DevyatDimensionalSack])% of this unit's max HP as Shield (max 20%)

Upon Retreat, apply 1 [ParryingResultUp] to 2 allies next turn (prioritizes Substituted units first, then in Deployment order)
- Lasts for 1 additional turn for every 15 [DevyatDimensionalSack] on self (2 more turns max)
1091011.name: Speedy Delivery

1091021.desc: To 1 ally with the fastest Speed: Clash Power +1 to Skills that apply [Burst] Potency or Count
1091021.name: Outstanding Courier

descs: [OnSucceedAttack] Gain 1 [DevyatDimensionalSack]
[OnSucceedAttack] Inflict 2 [Burst]

data.desc: [WhenUse] If target has 15+ [Burst] and 3+ [Burst] Count: this Skill does not consume target's [Burst] Count On Hit, but does not inflict [Burst] with this Skill's On Hit effects
